resources.string: Looks like you are using Bluetooth device. You need to connect it manually
You should grant Bluetooth permission in app\'s settings because you denied permission requests multiple times
This training is used for debugging connection with sensor and retrieving data from it
Control your emotional state, don\'t let the plane crash
Keep an eye on the second hand so you don\'t miss the time jump.
Keep an eye on the minute hand so you don\'t miss the time jump. The second and hour hands will interfere with you
